opendial.inference.approximate

Class SamplingAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.inference.approximate.SamplingAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class SamplingAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    Sampling-based inference algorithm for Bayesian networks. The class provides a set of functionalities for performing inference operations based on a particular sampling algorithm (e.g. likelihood weighting).
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • reduce

        public BNetwork reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
                throws DialException
        Reduces the Bayesian network to a subset of its variables and returns the result.

        NB: the equivalent "reduce" method includes additional speed-up methods to simplify the reduction process.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface InferenceAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        query - the reduction query
        Returns:
        the reduced Bayesian network
        Throws:
        DialException - if the inference process failed to deliver a result

      • getWeightedSamples

        public EmpiricalDistribution getWeightedSamples(Query query,
                                                java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Collection<Sample>> weightScheme)
                                         throws DialException
        Returns an empirical distribution for the particular query, after reweighting each samples based on the provided weighting scheme.
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        weightScheme - the weighting scheme for the samples
        Returns:
        the resulting empirical distribution for the query variables, after reweigthing
        Throws:
        DialException - if the reweighting operation failed.
